edu.sdccd.cisc191

Class ScreenView

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sdccd.cisc191.ScreenView

  • public class ScreenView
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for managing books in a library system. Provides a text field for input, buttons for adding, deleting, and sorting books, and a list view to display the collection of books.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScreenView(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructs a ScreenView object and initializes the user interface.

      Gets the list view for displaying the collection of books.
      javafx.scene.control.Button getSortButton()
      Gets the button for sorting books alphabetically.
